Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Subject Property located in the middle of the Campbell Heights North Business Park. The project offers premium exposure to 34A Ave, immediately off 192nd Street. Campbell Heights has earned a reputation amongst developers and business owners as being one of the best transportation hubs throughout Metro Vancouver due to it close proximity to the major thoroughfares of Highway 99, Highway 15, Highway 10, and Highway 1. In addition, Campbell Heights’ central location allows for easy access to both the US Border via the Pacific Border Crossing and the Delta Port via Highway 99.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE | PREMIUM FLEX-USE DEVELOPMENT IN CAMPBELL HEIGHTS NORTH

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is situated in the southwest quadrant of the 1,800-acre light industrial submarket of Surrey, BC. Surrey is the second largest municipality in Metro Vancouver and one of the fastest growing communities in all of Canada. The submarket, Campbell Heights Business Park, is conveniently accessible via multiple arterial roads and benefits from close proximity to the US border and Deltaport.

Common.AgentTitle.Common.Text:
Personal Real Estate Corporation
Vice President

Personal Real Estate Corporation
Senior Vice President

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Panorama Ridge is Beedie’s latest one-of-a-kind, first-class facility in Surrey’s fastest growing commercial and residential hub. On behalf of Beedie, CBRE is pleased to offer two unique buildings for lease that will accommodate your business requirements from 65,000 SF to 250,000 SF. Unique to this project, the development will feature significant glazing, multiple layout options and secured underground parking with private and designated access. The area is home to well-established businesses such as: FedEx, Sobeys, Thrifty Foods, Refresco Beverages, Johnstones Barbecues and Parts, amongst others.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is located within the highly sought-after Newton Industrial Parks which
is home to a wide range of light and heavy industries and manufacturing companies.
The property sits west of 132 Street and north of 80 Ave which offers quick access
to King George Highway.
